Signature, Inscription

Inscribed in pencil, verso: [1930 (or 1920?) France MC]
medium: Pastel and ink wash on paper
provenance: Vente du Bol d'Air, Versailles (sold to Sapiro); Mr. Sapiro, Paris (c. 1962-1967/68); Sale, Motte Galerie, Geneva, 1967, lot 65; bought in / sold back to Sapiro [été rachetée par son propriétaire]; [Rehn Gallery, New York, sold to Butler];  Mrs. Patrick Butler, St. Paul, 1968, gave to MIA
title: Mother and Child with Animals under a Tree
